analysis.key_quote: Given that OPM projects 50,000 conversions—potentially affecting cooperative-federalism programs (Medicaid, EPA delegations, DOE grants)—why was no intergovernmental consultation conducted under Exec. Order 13132 § 6(b)?
analysis.rationale: The comment primarily seeks clarification and raises procedural questions regarding the rule's impact and compliance with existing executive orders, without expressing a clear stance for or against the proposed rule.
